issue_title: [Bug]: Jest duplicates modules imported in both global setup/teardown and code under test
summary: Jest is a comprehensive JavaScript testing solution, designed for developers. It offers fast, interactive watch mode, instant feedback, and snapshot testing. Jest is easy to set up and works out of the box for most JavaScript projects. It is highly configurable and can be integrated with tools like Babel, webpack, Vite, Parcel, and TypeScript.
